tags.name: fluent-menu-item
tags.title: Menu item
tags.description: The Fluent UI menu item element

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the item

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.title: Expanded
attributes.description: The expanded state of the item

attributes.name: role
attributes.title: Role
attributes.description: The ARIA role of the menu item

attributes.name: checked
attributes.title: Checked
attributes.description: The checked state for elements with a role of menuitemradio or menuitemcheckbox

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: The content of the menu item

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the item content

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the item content
